name: Tower Control
description:
The theme was Tower, so after some brainstorming, I decide to try a little puzzle game about Tower Control, plane, and runways.

Unfortunately, I'm not totally satisfied with it, 'cause it's more chaotic than challenging, and I think I spend to much time on UI...

Anyway, feel free to leave a feedback! I'm curious about what you think to improve it :)

How to play

- Select a plane in the Arrival Queue at left, and select a runway to place it, before it run out of gas!

- Be careful! You won't be able to replace a plane on a runway before the previous one on it reach the depot.

- Red plane are slower, and green plane are faster, but have more limited fuel!
